solution_line_template: Three weeks ago, there were {campers_two_weeks_ago} - {more_than_three_weeks_ago} = <<{campers_two_weeks_ago}-{more_than_three_weeks_ago}={campers_three_weeks_ago}>>{campers_three_weeks_ago} campers.

The total number of campers from three to two weeks ago is {campers_three_weeks_ago} + {campers_two_weeks_ago} = <<{campers_three_weeks_ago}+{campers_two_weeks_ago}={campers_first_two_weeks}>>{campers_first_two_weeks}.
Hence, there were {total_campers} - {campers_first_two_weeks} = <<{total_campers}-{campers_first_two_weeks}={campers_last_week}>>{campers_last_week} campers last week.
